featuredGames.title: AntiLogic
featuredGames.shortdescription: A short simple game about....well answering a quiz!
featuredGames.description:
A short simple game about....well answering a quiz!

Made in like 3 hours (maybe a bit over but idk I forgot).

Oh yeah, somewhat inspired by my childhood game The Impossible Quiz.

CREDITS:

maybekoi - Programming and Concept Art

hiroshiNG - Final Art

Kennedy - Idea
featuredGames.author: koi

featuredGames.title: BBCR
featuredGames.shortdescription: This game isn't what it seems to be...
featuredGames.description:
Escape Baldi's schoolhouse again in this new remastered version of Baldi's Basics Classic!
Featuring three games in one, gameplay improvements, a more authentic art style, accessibility improvements, and brand new ways to play!
Whether you've played the original or this is your first time, you'll surely have a blast!

GAME BY: MYSTMAN12

WEBGL PORT BY: maybekoi
featuredGames.author: koi

featuredGames.title: Fancy Pants Adventures: World 1 Remix!
featuredGames.shortdescription: Relive the nostalgia of The Fancy Pants Adventures.
featuredGames.description: Relive the nostalgia of The Fancy Pants Adventures: World 1 as you speed over spidery slopes and parkour your way to victory!
featuredGames.author: koi
